name: tomcat6 Chef cookbook
description: Installs and configures all aspects of tomcat6 using custom local installation
readme:
= DESCRIPTION:

Installs Tomcat6

= REQUIREMENTS:

== Platform and Application Environment:

Tested on Centos 5.2 8.10. May work on other platforms, esp Redhat.
Needs Java at least Java 5

== Cookbooks:

Opscode cookbooks, http://github.com/opscode/cookbooks/tree/master:

* java

= ATTRIBUTES:
